<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/x86">X86</a> has certain instructions which enable interrupts exactly one instruction <em>after</em> the instruction which stores to SS.

<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">/// X86 can reduce the bytes of NOP by padding instructions with prefixes to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">/// get a better peformance in some cases. Here, we determine which prefix is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the most suitable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the instruction has a segment override prefix, use the existing one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the target is 64-bit, use the CS.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the target is 32-bit,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - If the instruction has a ESP/EBP base register, use SS.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">///   - Otherwise use DS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">uint8&#95;t X86AsmBackend::determinePaddingPrefix(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a> &amp;Inst)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Prefixes can be added only in 32-bit or 64-bit mode.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// specific bits to determine number of prefixes its safe to add.  Various</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a4b45cdd0366bfaa446ebdb3f00d80496"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/x86asmbackend/#a4b45cdd0366bfaa446ebdb3f00d80496">X86AsmBackend::finishLayout</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Asm)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See if we can further relax some instructions to cut down on the number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// nop bytes required for code alignment.  The actual win is in reducing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction count, not number of bytes.  Modern X86-64 can easily end up</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decode limited.  It is often better to reduce the number of instructions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (i.e. eliminate nops) even at the cost of increasing the size and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// complexity of others.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/#ac5493f0a7c649b6d0ac023f19af7a6c3">X86PadForAlign</a> &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/#a43f30dd8395928416cc42cc0346dffb8">X86PadForBranchAlign</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The processed regions are delimitered by LabeledFragments. -g may have more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MCSymbols and therefore different relaxation results. X86PadForAlign is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// disabled by default to eliminate the -g vs non -g difference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To keep the effects local, prefer to relax instructions closest to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the align directive.  This is purely about human understandability</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the resulting code.  If we later find a reason to expand</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// particular instructions over others, we can adjust.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemainingSize = OrigSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Relaxable.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>() &amp;&amp; RemainingSize != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we have an instruction which hasn&#39;t been fully relaxed, we can&#39;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// offset might require a larger negative offset than it can encode.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;BF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;MCBoundaryAlignFragment&gt;</a>(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LastFragment)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><Highlight kind="normal">          ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The layout is done. Mark every fragment as valid.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &amp;Section : Asm) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Write a sequence of optimal nops to the output, covering \\p Count</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// length.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Rest != 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> != 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compact unwind encoding values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067">CompactUnwindEncodings</a> &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// &#91;RE&#93;BP based frame where &#91;RE&#93;BP is pused on the stack immediately after</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// the return address, then &#91;RE&#93;SP is moved to &#91;RE&#93;BP.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a6a430d800822edae2d2e36131395615d"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a6a430d800822edae2d2e36131395615d">UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;BP&#95;FRAME</a>                   = 0x01000000,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A frameless function with a small constant stack size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067ad96614bec64aaa57a8bac8c6f07181d7"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067ad96614bec64aaa57a8bac8c6f07181d7">UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;STACK&#95;IMMD</a>                 = 0x02000000,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Create the permutation encoding used with frameless stacks. It is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// passed the number of registers to be saved and an array of the registers</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint32&#95;t encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithoutFrame(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RegCount)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The saved registers are numbered from 1 to 6 In order to encode the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order in which they were saved, we re-number them according to their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// place in the register order. The re-numbering is relative to the last</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// re-numbered register. E.g., if we have registers &#123;6, 2, 4, 5&#125; saved in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that order:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    Orig  Re-Num</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//    ----  ------</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     6       6</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     2       2</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     4       3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     5       3</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; RegCount; ++i) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::reverse(&amp;SavedRegs&#91;0&#93;, &amp;SavedRegs&#91;CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> j = CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS - RegCount; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a> &lt; i; ++<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea363b122c528f54df4a0446b6bab05515">j</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1402"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1403"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1404"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">case</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mccfiinstruction/#aaf905b9d7696f2b8da2e4c89c860f6eca74ec33979cec7221719caa137b50da3f">MCCFIInstruction::OpOffset</a>: &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1405"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Defines a &quot;push&quot; of a callee-saved register. E.g.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1406"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1407"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     pushq %r15</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1408"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     pushq %r14</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1409"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     pushq %rbx</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1410"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  L0:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1411"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     subq $120, %rsp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1412"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  L1:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1413"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %rbx, -40</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %r14, -32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     .cfi&#95;offset %r15, -24</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1416"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1417"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SavedRegIdx == CU&#95;NUM&#95;SAVED&#95;REGS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1418"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If there are too many saved registers, we cannot use a compact</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1419"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unwind encoding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1420"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1421"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1422"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> Reg = &#42;MRI.getLLVMRegNum(Inst.getRegister(), </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1423"><Highlight kind="normal">        SavedRegs&#91;SavedRegIdx++&#93; = Reg;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1424"><Highlight kind="normal">        StackAdjust += OffsetSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1425"><Highlight kind="normal">        MinAbsOffset = std::min(MinAbsOffset, std::abs(Inst.getOffset()));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1426"><Highlight kind="normal">        InstrOffset += <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-x86asmbackend-cpp-/darwinx86asmbackend/#ad082921349ec650f4165036b1535993a">PushInstrSize</a>(Reg);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1427"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1428"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1429"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1430"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1431"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1432"><Highlight kind="normal">    StackAdjust /= StackDivide;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1434"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HasFP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1435"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((StackAdjust &amp; 0xFF) != StackAdjust)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1436"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Offset was too big for a compact unwind encoding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1437"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1438"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1439"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t attempt to track a real StackAdjust, so if the saved registers</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1440"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aren&#39;t adjacent to rbp we can&#39;t cope.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1441"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SavedRegIdx != 0 &amp;&amp; MinAbsOffset != 3 &#42; (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)OffsetSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1442"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1443"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the encoding of the saved registers when we have a frame pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1445"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t RegEnc = encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithFrame();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1446"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegEnc == ~0U) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1447"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1448"><Highlight kind="normal">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a6a430d800822edae2d2e36131395615d">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;BP&#95;FRAME</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1449"><Highlight kind="normal">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackAdjust &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1450"><Highlight kind="normal">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= RegEnc &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067af4ab9f398422d0b86cd487c6edd95736">CU::UNWIND&#95;BP&#95;FRAME&#95;REGISTERS</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1451"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1452"><Highlight kind="normal">      SubtractInstrIdx += InstrOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1453"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++StackAdjust;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1454"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1455"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((StackSize &amp; 0xFF) == StackSize) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1456"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Frameless stack with a small stack size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1457"><Highlight kind="normal">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067ad96614bec64aaa57a8bac8c6f07181d7">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;STACK&#95;IMMD</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1458"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1459"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the stack size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1460"><Highlight kind="normal">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackSize &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1461"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1462"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((StackAdjust &amp; 0x7) != StackAdjust)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1463"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The extra stack adjustments are too big for us to handle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1464"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1465"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1466"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Frameless stack with an offset too large for us to encode compactly.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1467"><Highlight kind="normal">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067abc74b2c720b10e4cc1347bd310a930b4">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;STACK&#95;IND</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1468"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1469"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the offset to the nnnnnn value in the &#39;subl $nnnnnn, ESP&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1470"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1471"><Highlight kind="normal">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (SubtractInstrIdx &amp; 0xFF) &lt;&lt; 16;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1472"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1473"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode any extra stack adjustments (done via push instructions).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1474"><Highlight kind="normal">        CompactUnwindEncoding |= (StackAdjust &amp; 0x7) &lt;&lt; 13;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1475"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1476"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1477"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the number of registers saved. (Reverse the list first.)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1478"><Highlight kind="normal">      std::reverse(&amp;SavedRegs&#91;0&#93;, &amp;SavedRegs&#91;SavedRegIdx&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1479"><Highlight kind="normal">      CompactUnwindEncoding |= (SavedRegIdx &amp; 0x7) &lt;&lt; 10;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1480"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the encoding of the saved registers when we don&#39;t have a frame</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1482"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pointer.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1483"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint32&#95;t RegEnc = encodeCompactUnwindRegistersWithoutFrame(SavedRegIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1484"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RegEnc == ~0U) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a525c66164a17a018715e2943f976b565">CU::UNWIND&#95;MODE&#95;DWARF</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1485"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1486"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Encode the register encoding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1487"><Highlight kind="normal">      CompactUnwindEncoding |=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1488"><Highlight kind="normal">        RegEnc &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-x86asmbackend-cpp-/cu/#a53d1137279e003417f6eea1132ee2067a0d782a80c0c846892bebe03111c8372a">CU::UNWIND&#95;FRAMELESS&#95;STACK&#95;REG&#95;PERMUTATION</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1489"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1490"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CompactUnwindEncoding;</Highlight></CodeLine>
